title: Question For Shurima Art Contest
body:
Dear Riot,
I'm just excited on my prize and just asking when do I get it? (I'm not rushing or anything just asking nicely :))
thank you :D
<3 SUPPORT!

replies.body:
"Congrats to all the winners! You should have an email from me to confirm prizing and summoner name. Prizes will be in your accounts by Wednesday this week." - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/eYNKkieR-shurima-art-contest-top-10

Congrats on winning, but you should really read the post next time.
